name: Venomage

skills.name: Toxicity
skills.description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Decreases the targets MAX HP by 75% of the damage inflicted if they are under [Heal Reduction] debuff. Each hit has a 35% chance of activating up to two Poison debuffs on the target.
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff chance +5%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff chance +10%
Damage Multiplier: 2.4 ATK

effects.stat: ATK|HP|DEF|MAX HP|ENEMY_MAX_HP|Turn Meter|NA|... (as needed, where NA is 'not applicable'. This allows schema validation. This value should not be null)
effects.duration: Duration of buff/debuff in turns (if applicable)
effects.notes: Describe scaling, conditions, or special logic. Use multiple objects for multi-component or conditional effects.

skills.book_value: Value to fully book ex faster cooldown, more damage or debuff chance, etc.
skills.notes: Additional notes (conditional effects, scaling, special interactions, etc.)

skills.name: Neurotoxin (Cooldown: 4 turns)
skills.description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 75% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns. Also has a 75% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns if the target is under a [Poison] debuff.
Level 2: Damage +10%
Level 3: Buff/Debuff chance +10%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff chance +15%
Level 5: Cooldown -1
Damage Multiplier: 6 ATK

skills.name: Fleshmelter Venom (Cooldown: 4 turns)
skills.description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 3 turns. Also has a 75% chance of placing two 5% [Poison] debuffs for 2 turns.
Level 2: Damage + 10%
Level 3: Buff/Debuff chance +10%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff chance +15%
Level 5: Cooldown -1
Damage Multiplier: 4 ATK
